name: Inside Inc.
description:
In our game you could visit the inner world of man, who suffers from very dangerous disease. Player's goal is to destroy this disease with help of tiny (but armed) ship, which float inside of body.

------------

Controls:

WASD - movement; LMOUSE – shoot

------------

Made by One Wing Cicada (https://twitter.com/one_wing_cicada).

We are grateful to the Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) for the music: Rollin at 5 - electronic & Lobby Time.
